page.title: 14THE ROSE QUEEN,COTEHILL
page.content: The Rose queen will take place on the seventh of July.We have a queen and some attendants.They sit on the back of a trailor which is towed by a tractor.The queen sits on a chair.The attendants sit on the trailor but two stand on either side of the queen.When the tractor comes into the playing field the queen is crowned and the attendants get off and curtsey and the boys bow to the queen.When that is over we have fancy dress which is judged in five age groups.When the fancy dress is finished we have races and some stalls which sell things like ice cream,sweets and various other things.We have quite a lot of races.The prizes are money for first ,second and third.We have a cross country which is about two miles long. The first girl and boy back to cotehill get a trophy.
